## cilium endpoint regenerate

Force regeneration of endpoint program

### Synopsis


Force regeneration of endpoint program

```
cilium endpoint regenerate <endpoint-id>
```

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
